text:
@johnmcdonnellMP Yep, if only we had a reasonable government.

Had Boris Johnson's priority been to contain the coronavirus, the government should have introduced Emergency Universal Basic Income too.

How much did people commuting & working in non-essential jobs spread Covid-19?

Short-sighted.
